title: Niraamaya Centre - Homeopathy
description: Niraamaya Centre offers top quality homeopathy services to our clients as an alternative form of treatment for many acute and chronic ailments. We are located in Bangkok, Thailand.
cleaned_text: As a holistic medicine, homeopathy treats the symptoms of the body and mind as a totality, not as a series of unconnected parts. Homeopaths recognize that symptoms of ill-health are expressions of disharmony within the interconnected elements of the person as a whole. Our homeopaths will assess your physical, emotional, mental and spiritual symptoms regarding them as intimately connected to treat your conditions. You will then be prescribed a remedy which will help simulate your body's natural ability to heal.
